description.plain:
Shelley Marshaun Massenburg-Smith (b. August 3, 1988), better known by his stage name Shelley (formerly known as DRAM), is a Virginia-based rapper, singer, and producer. He was first placed in the spotlight in 2015 when Beyoncé shared a video of her own rendition of his hit song, “Cha Cha”, a single on his “#1 Epic Summer” mixtape.

“Cha Cha” was originally  released in 2014 and first picked up by Cleveland R&B radio station Z 107.9 FM in their “weekend warmer” campaign.

Shelley was born Shelley Massenburg-Smith in 1988 in Germany.

His former stage-name, DRAM, is an acronym that stands for Does Real Ass Music.

His former stage-name, DRAM, is an acronym that stands for Does Real Ass Music.

songs.full_title: Broccoli by DRAM (Ft. Lil Yachty)
songs.title: Broccoli

description.plain:
Virginia’s own D.R.A.M. teams up with Atlanta-via-the-Internet sensation Lil Yachty for this upbeat ode to the lord of the vegetable kingdom: weed.

The duo flexed their viral muscle by releasing the single on SoundCloud originally, where it became a sleeper hit and migrated to the big streaming services.

This is actually neither the first nor only rap song named “Broccoli.” All-time Bay Area legend E-40 released his own song named for the cruciferous comestible way back in 1998.

On June 21st, 2016 the song debuted on the Billboard Hot 100 at number 87.

The video for the song was released on July 22nd, and features D.R.A.M and Yachty riding around on a piano and waving  bits of actual broccoli in the air.

songs.embed_content: Read “Broccoli” by DRAM on Genius

songs.full_title: Cha Cha by DRAM
songs.title: Cha Cha

description.plain:
Song off of D.R.A.M.’s #1EpicSummer Mixtape. He sings about his experience with a Dominican girl he meets in a bar.

Since it was released, this song has brought D.R.A.M. cosigns from notable hip hop artists like Chance The Rapper and Rick Rubin:

https://twitter.com/chancetherapper/status/530405145859731456

https://instagram.com/p/y8GcE8DHUp/?modal=true

Beyoncé famously posted an GIF on Instagram dancing to “Cha Cha.”

songs.embed_content: Read “Cha Cha” by DRAM on Genius
